WebientSoft EsyKart version ${version}
=====================================================================================

To find out what has changed since earlier releases, see the 'Change Log' section at
https://jira.webientsoft.com/browse/EKART

Please consult the documentation located within the 'docs/esykart-reference'
directory of this release and also visit the official WebientSoft home at
http://webientsoft.com/products/esykart

There you will find links to the forum, issue tracker, and other resources.

See https://github.com/webientsoft/esykart #readme for additional
information including instructions on building from source.
